body:
### Welcome to SimplyTech
* Do you need to enable your website or webapp with real-time communication?
* Do you want to talk with your clients in real-time using only your browser and their browser?
* Do you want to have a video conference with them as they visit your website?
* Do you want to develop a real-time multi-player game that will work in the browser on any device?

**SimplyTech is here to help.**

We specialize in: 
* Real-time communication in the browser
* Node.js
* HTML5 / CSS3
* Ruby on Rails
* Javascript

### Contact
Drop us an email today: info (at) simplytech (dot) com
name: SimplyTech real-time web development
